mainSequence.step: Admin requests to update receptionist information.
Router calls Controller to show update form.
Controller fetches receptionist data from Repository.
Repository retrieves receptionist data from Database.
Controller displays update form with current data.
Admin fills in updated receptionist details and submits.
UI sends updated data to Router.
Router calls Controller to update receptionist.
Controller saves the updated receptionist data in the Repository.
Repository updates receptionist data in the Database.
